landing.hero.title: infrastructure for software
landing.hero.description.benefit: makes adapting your application to different markets easy.
landing.integration.caption: Tech stack agnostic
landing.integration.title: Integrates into any codebase
landing.integration.description: Inlang is designed to be stack agnostic. Developers can write their own plugins, or rely on the plugin ecosystem, to adapt inlang to their tech stack (React, Flutter, iOS, Python, etc.).
landing.config.editor.title: Web Editor
landing.config.editor.description: No-code editor to manage your translations.
landing.config.editor.benefit1: No translator needs to touch code
landing.config.editor.benefit3: No sync pipelines and extra accounts
landing.config.extension.title: IDE Extension
landing.config.extension.description: Handle translations directly in VSCode through an extension.
landing.config.cli.title: inlang CLI
landing.config.cli.description: CLI to interact with inlang's infastructure.
landing.pricing.title: Free for individual use and open source
landing.pricing.caption: Pricing
landing.pricing.description: Inlang is a commercial product. But, individual use and open source stays free. We see individual use as good "marketing" that helps us acquiring enterprise customers.
landing.pricing.free.name: free
landing.pricing.free.title: Individuals and Open Source
landing.pricing.paid.name: paid
landing.pricing.paid.title: Enterprise
landing.getstarted.caption: Add inlang to your project
landing.getstarted.title: Take your software global
landing.getstarted.description: Setup inlang in your code base and start using IDE extension, CLI and web editor.
